diff_hunk:
@@ -732,6 +732,115 @@ def testVarOpScopeNestedOuterScope(self):
           with ops.name_scope("scope2") as sc2:
             self.assertEqual(sc2, "outer_1/default/scope2/")
 
+  def testBasicWhenAuxiliaryNameScopeIsFalse(self):
+    with self.test_session():
+      with variable_scope.variable_scope("scope",
+                                         auxiliary_name_scope=False) as scope:
+        self.assertEqual(scope.original_name_scope, "")
body: Perhaps it's better to restrict `auxiliary_name_scope` for reentering case.  Namely, `auxiliary_name_scope` only takes effect when VariableScope is passed.
body_html: Perhaps it's better to restrict auxiliary_name_scope for reentering case. Namely, auxiliary_name_scope only takes effect when VariableScope is passed.
body_text: Perhaps it's better to restrict auxiliary_name_scope for reentering case.  Namely, auxiliary_name_scope only takes effect when VariableScope is passed.
